Even though you were so excited to ride on the Geo Plane.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>It's scary, I keep thinking of what will happen if it falls.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,07>You've sure become a coward to think like that! Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>むかつくヤロ-だ
